meanings.definition: A contemptuous term for a black person.
meanings.sent1: He called the man a nigger because of his skin color.
meanings.sent2: The use of the word nigger is considered highly offensive.
meanings.sent3: The comedian used the term nigger in a joke, but it fell flat.
meanings.sent4: The word nigger carries a heavy historical weight.
meanings.sent5: The slur nigger should never be used to refer to someone.

meanings.definition: A person of any race or origin regarded as contemptible, inferior, ignorant, etc.
meanings.sent1: She thought of him as a lazy nigger who never did any work.
meanings.sent2: The bully called everyone who disagreed with him a nigger.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted like a nigger, lounging around all day.
meanings.sent4: The broken machine was a nigger, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent5: The nigger in the office was always gossiping and causing drama.
